meanings.definition: A magnetic tape used for recording and playing back video and sound.
meanings.sent1: I found some old videotapes of our family vacations.
meanings.sent2: The store sells videotapes of classic movies.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks the videotapes are toys and tries to play with them.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like videotapes, replaying the happiest moments.
meanings.sent5: The videotapes contained precious moments captured in time.

meanings.sent1: I will videotape the school play for you.
meanings.sent2: She videotapes her cooking show to share online.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally videotaped his own reflection instead of the event.
meanings.sent4: The artist's mind videotapes every detail of the scenery.
meanings.sent5: Videotaping the interview will ensure we don't miss any information.

meanings.definition: To watch or listen to a recording on videotape.
meanings.sent1: Let's videotape the movie and watch it later.
meanings.sent2: They spent the evening videotaping their favorite TV show.
meanings.sent3: She pretended to videotape herself singing for fun.
meanings.sent4: His mind videotapes the music, playing it back in his dreams.
meanings.sent5: Videotaping the concert allowed them to relive the experience.
